g++  -g -DCHECK_PTHREAD_RETURN_VALUE -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -std=c++0x -rdynamic -O2 -finline-limit=1000 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/l_124_bin_tree_max_path_sum.dir/l_124_bin_tree_max_path_sum.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/l_124_bin_tree_max_path_sum  -Wl,-rpath,/mnt/hgfs/learngit/code/build/lib ../../lib/libutility.so
